name: tinyfeed
tagline: A minimal and distraction free RSS reader
description: Tinyfeed is a self-hosted minimal RSS reader with focus on simplicity. It fetches feeds on a schedule and presents them in a clean, distraction-free web interface.

features.title: Clean Interface
features.description: Read articles in a distraction-free interface focused on content consumption

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Add, remove, and organize feeds with folders or categories for better organization

features.title: Article Filtering
features.description: Filter articles by feed, date, or read status to focus on relevant content

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Navigate a simple, lightweight interface that loads quickly and stays out of your way

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Import feed subscriptions from other readers using standard OPML format
